title: What's the best free Article Spinner or content spinner for SEO? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, there I am sure you have learned there are all kinds of article spinner on the internet. I often need to create some novel contents for my blog, so I have contacted many article spin tools. As for me, I suggest that Ŝ-Ç 6 is a nice choice. Here are some reasons : If you are a blogger and want to create bulk new contents. This tool can create thousands of novel contents for you in just a few minutes. When we want to improve our articles, this tool is quipped the best AI engine, which can understand your articles well, Just one click, It can rewrite your articles and drastically improve uniqueness and readability. It can understand your articles just like the way google does. It can even customize your own spin rules if you want. It has a high level of customize degree. Besides, It has many super-advanced functions such as auto-grammar fix, It can check all your articles and correct the error you make in article. What’s more, there are over 200000 contributors maintain cloud thesaurus every day. Thousands of new synonyms will be add to cloud each day. This tool will just become more and more smarter. In conclusion, If you want to rewrite your articles or spin contents. It is a perfect choice for you. Hope this helps

Doing SEO for 4 years, i often need to write a lot of articles for my SEO work, it is annoying, need a lot of idea and imagination, cost much time. Finally i found a great SEO assistant - Spinner Chief 5 the best article spinning software. It can not only generate hundreds of new articles in minutes, but also with one click it can rewrite articles to a very high level of human readability and uniqueness.  By using the latest cutting edge Statistical Replacement Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Part-Of-Speech analysis and Emulated Natural Language methods, Spinner Chief 5 can automatically create content that is close to human quality. Now article spinner has both a desktop and a web version! You can not only use SpinnerChief on your windows pc, but also you can also use it on your MacBook, Ipad and Android System etc. In the 5th version, it also added the new paragraph and sentence swap spin function, that can make your articles to be more unique. Now you can create and edit yourself paragraph/sentence spinning rule, which will help you to spin paragraph/sentence much more readable and unique. There is a great thing that SC5 has added a Team version, it has some special functions for team using, create/manage/use team thesaurus with team members together, and multi-users can use the license on different computer with themselves member accounts. Manager can manage team members easily. The new version can also spin html code, so if your articles have html, images and videos Spinner Chief can handle them.
